name: Survey Objects
description: The Survey Objects Brightspace Data Set describes all the surveys in the organization.

columns.name: SurveyId
columns.description: Unique survey identifier.

columns.name: SurveyName
columns.description: Name of the survey.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Category Id for the survey. Field can be null.

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the survey. Field can be null.

columns.name: DescriptionEnabled
columns.description: Indicates if the survey description is enabled.

columns.name: HasInstantFeedback
columns.description: Indicates if the survey provides instant feedback.

columns.name: IsAnonymous
columns.description: Indicates if the survey results are anonymous.

columns.name: IsVisible
columns.description: Indicates if the survey is visible or hidden from users.

columns.name: SubmissionMessage
columns.description: Message provided when user submits survey. Field can be null.

columns.name: Footer
columns.description: Footer of the survey. Field can be null.

columns.name: FooterIsDisplayed
columns.description: Indicates if the footer is displayed.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Start date and time of the survey (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: End date and time of the survey (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DisplayInCalendar
columns.description: Indicates if the survey is displayed in the calendar.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: AttemptsAllowed
columns.description: Indicates the number of attempts of the survey that a user is allowed to take. Field can be null.

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Order in which surveys appear in the interface.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who created the survey.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the survey is deleted (1) or not (0).

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the survey was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: Id of the user who last modified the survey.

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Indicates the version of the row. This information is used to determine which table row occurred first, similar to the way time stamps function in other data sets.

columns.name: CategoryName
columns.description: Name of the category in which the survey belongs. Field can be null.
